pages.text: The water stone is the link between the living and the non-living. Masters of water are always ready for changes in life, they will always help those who are in trouble.

pages.title: Abilities
pages.text: Water Stream - deals damage to the target with a powerful stream of water.$(br)Water Shock - strikes an opponent with a block of water (when it hits the block, the water spills over).$(br)Healing Water - heals the master when he is in the water.$(br)$(br)$(br)Weapon: Water katana$(br)Passive ability: Underwater breathing
